===How to install jaxb-addon _Spring Roo Addon_===

 * Get the latest jaxb-addon: 
  [http://spring-roo-addons.googlecode.com/files/net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar]
 * Install the addon via the Roo shell
{{{
  roo> felix shell start file:/<absolute path to the addon directory>/net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon-1.1.0-SNAPSHOT.jar
}}}
 * Verify the installation:
{{{
  roo> osgi ps 
}}}
 * You should see something like:
{{{
...
[  60] [Active     ] [    1] net.tzolov.jaxb.roo.addon (1.1.0.SNAPSHOT)
}}}
